name: The How of Business - How to start
what_you_do: The How of Business podcast provides practical advice, tips, and techniques for small business owners and aspiring entrepreneurs to start, run, grow, and exit their businesses.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves small business owners and entrepreneurs, offering insights and interviews to help them succeed.
business_focus: The How of Business podcast provides practical advice, tips, and techniques for small business owners and aspiring entrepreneurs to start, run, grow, and exit their businesses.
